solution_line_template: The farmer earned $60 from selling fowl because {wheelbarrow_cost} / (1/{earnings_spent_fraction_denominator}) = <<{wheelbarrow_cost}/(1/{earnings_spent_fraction_denominator})={total_fowl_earnings}>>{total_fowl_earnings}
The farmer earned $40 selling chickens because {num_chickens_sold} x {chicken_price} = <<{num_chickens_sold}*{chicken_price}={chicken_earnings}>>{chicken_earnings}
The farmer earned $20 selling ducks because {total_fowl_earnings} - {chicken_earnings} = <<{total_fowl_earnings}-{chicken_earnings}={duck_earnings}>>{duck_earnings}
